Mission mangal was an entertaining movie but lacked seriousness & dedication towards the script. This movie may not have those entertaining scenes but trust me u'll get goosebumps every 20 mins.

R Madhavan sir took the initiative to tell us the Painful Story of our Nation's Real Hero. This movie shows the story of people who had to pay a heavy price for being A true Patriot. After Kashmir Files & now this I don't know why such stories were kept hidden till now and till date no Director was ready to Direct this film so R Madhavan sir had to do it in order to bring this story to us & we failed to still failed to make it Housefull, its really shame that we as a nation didn't stand with Dr. Nambi Narayanan but instead troubled him and his family without being proven as guilty.

What a legend Madhvan is. Ever since he debuted in Bollywood I have liked his performances in each film, no matter how the film actually is. Lately, fictional movies which have a ' alternate history' and are dollops of fiction, have been passed off and seen as ' Real History ' . Despite these movies, as per their censor board certification, claiming that they are based on artistic freedom and are neither documentaries nor bibliography, Bhakts and Pajeets are singing paens about them. It started with Kashmir Files and continues. From pure fiction of Prithviraj winning all battles to highlighting pure fantasies of glorious past, anything goes as long as it bashes Muslims or shows India's past and history, rich and superior to other cultures. Not only Nambi sir many of our great scientists didn't accept NASA's job ..the best example is Kalam Sir 🙏🏽 This movie should be watched by everyone. Just like Narayan sir never got the position and respect he deserved, R Madhavan being an extremely talented actor, didn't get that much from bollywood and audience which he deserved good to see that south industry is giving justice to his talent Most Important thing With minimal technical terms, Madhavan makes 'Rocketry' movie intense and totally engaging and doesn't show Nambi as God but keeps things authentic. And of course Thanks to srk and surya for working for no money and giving great performance in the movieR madhavan should get national award such an impactful performance 🎭May no one be so much cruel to such a gem person who has sacrificed his life for humanity and didn't expect anything for his personal purpose. Please don't give this type treatment to this kind people. Seriously everyone should watch this movie and know who is the respected genius Nambi Narayan is. Please everyone go to the theatre and make this type of content hit. So that in future we will see this type of content and effort more and more. Rocketry perhaps after a very long time we got to see a real content movie which had no nonsense scenes cheap dialogues songs just a pure movie with refreshing story and message for today youngsters who hardly know about these issues10/10.

reviews.review_title: Rockery of Isro or Mr. Nambi's
reviews.content: The movie is written and Directed really well and in the end where nambi sir had been casted made it more touchy, every Indian should watch this movie. I have given 9 stars because I am still curious and I still have unanswered questions.

Briefly, quite an emotionally gripping drama. Excels in all departments. Don't understand why it is not a blockbuster. Probably ahead of its time, unable to appeal to today's mass audience. But I am sure it would be counted as one of the best Indian films of all-time. Best wishes.SRK leaves his mark in just one sequence also.

reviews.review_title: Thank a lot for making this 🙌
reviews.content: I just want to thanks, Thank you so much for making this. The movie outstanding. One of the most impact full biography, As in movie it's one of the finest films. The story telling is so good. Everyone does a good job.Scenes of the movie is so natural and intense, dialogues are impact full. A must watch masterpiece.Kudos to the entire team and crew members for all their hard work. Movie is very engaging. Directing is fantastic.Movie is well portrayed for the false implications alleged on great patriotic scientist and it took years to find the truth of allegations.This movie is a clear example of worst effect of early judging and how much worse one life of an innocent can get when public react without proven guilt. Requesting public please don't act before conclusion because damages like this can leave deep scars on innocents.

When a biography is made about a filmstar who's a drug addict and is proud of the fact that he's a womanizer, or about the Mafia queen of Mumbai... We rush to the theatres with a sense of obligation to make it a success...
But it's sad to see that once in a Blue moon when someone decides to make an honest movie about a true hero and a patriot then we struggle to find reasons to watch it. So much so that there is a whole group of so called intellectuals who run a campaign about this one fact about the movie which I might now have even noticed hadn't so many reviewers pointed it out.Yes Nambi Narayan is shown to be a devout Hindu, religious man but this portrayal is only highlighted in times of extreme stress or in very critical moments I'm his life. Who doesn't like to look up to a higher power during such times no matter which God you believe in.It shows that even in his weakest moments when he had hit really rock bottom he his faith didn't waiver, he didn't become a recluse or resentful. He kept fighting to prove his innocence and to prove that he is a Patriot beyond doubt.This movie is not about religion. It's about a man who chose his country over money and a plush comfortable life as a Nasa Scientist. Majority of us working for Multinational conglomerate as glorified low cost labourers would find it difficult to accept the fact that people like Nambi Sir exist.Hats of to R Madhavan and Shah Rukh Khan for doing their part to give this man the respect he deserves.
Amazing movie. Finally truth of fake spy case of Nambi ji is coming out. Full family should watch in the cinema hall. Atleast this movie should get Osscan nomination as a foreign film.
Great direction. Great acting and great story telling. Truly moved by this movie. Thanking Madhavan Sir and Surya sir for shedding light in Nambi Sir's story.

reviews.review_title: Indian audience is too easily impressed
reviews.content: This movie is so bad from.the direction to the over acting to the bad art to the absolutely unrealistic portrayal of characters. Subtlety is not madhavan's strong suit. They portray nambi to be some.crazy narcissist who was the only one with any brains across 5 countries, ya I'm sure that's a very exact portrayal. Then, Isro is shown to be the lamest body in existence, and the indian government to be the dumbest to exist. Only nambi has all the answers. Lol. What a laughable lame movie. I wish someone with better budgets and sense made this story come to life.

Little bit of Bollywood masala but overall an amazing movie. I dont want to be biased but if I put myself in Nambi's shoe I think he is innocent. Even today when Indian salaries are really good its tough for mist of us to go back to India. However Nambi left Princeton Univ and NASA job that itself speaks for itself. Really sad that politician and police can do such thing.

reviews.review_title: A biography at it's finest....Superb, Heart touching..
reviews.content: The story of a great man, a patriot shown at it's full justice. It is clearly an act of class, dedication and commitment that madhavan, it would rather say Maddy has put in to bring the story of the man at it's very best. Each instance covered, the way the story had been taken it is not less than a thrilling James Bond movie. Patriotism is not only just with people who are gauding us at the boarder, but people like Nambi sir who take us to the country's progress, sacrificing even there personal life. I would say such personalities should be taught to our young generation, who can be of great inspiration. The climax, literally set tears in my eyes but that will not give the man what he lost all these years after the sincerity and commitment he has shown for the nation. Alone with APJ, Nambi's effect should also be celebrated at national level. Maddy great work no words..... salute.

Rocketry is an Eye Opener for People who still did not Believe or were not aware about The Torcher and Humiliation Nambi Sir went through , An Honest Scientist and brilliant one at that was made a scapegoat because of his Patriotism and Vision to take India ahead into The Space race , Imagine if this Fake case was never made , India would have been way ahead in Space race now but Thanks to Nambi Sir , Apj Abdul Kalam Sir and ISRO who never gave up hope to make India a Superpower in Space , Nambi Sir ko Sat Sat Naman , Hats off to Madhavan for Portraying the role of India 's Gem and bringing his Ordeal and Contribution on big screen 🙏

This movie is exceptional in all the stories of Mr Nambi Narayan.It displays the tough situations our Indian scientists have to face.Patriotism needs to be paid for in this country.However it does not name and shame any party or community and stays politically correct.An exceptional movie in every sense. Could be a little more blunt.

reviews.review_title: A masterpiece biopic on a great mind from india

Don't forget the sufferings that Mr. Nambi Narayanan sir had was atleast 60% more than that which this movie shows as it has a time limit to narrate the story. Each and every human should see the movie to understand the values of a human and humanity which Mr. Nambi sir has taught us. Salute to Nambi Sir and Mr. Madhavan🙏🏻

The movie very well portrayed Exemplary, Exceptional, Exhilarating and ofcourse excruciatingly painful life of ISRO scientist Nambi Narayanan. All the actors delivered excellent performance. Madhavan nailed it as a Director Producer. Screenwriter and and an actor.

I have no words other than bow downing to the great man Nambi Narayanan Sir. Excellent movie direction and screenplay. Very good film Madhavan's acting is very good. I liked this the best film ever made on a biography of a person. The emotional part of the film is shown very well. The story of a scientist in the film was a conspiracy with him, he has been shown very well by linking the story of ISRO together. A good film sends many messages to the society. Many directors resort to obscenity to make the film a hit, so that the film cannot be seen with the whole family. Such directors should learn from such a film. Can also become.

But at last my gf was right and the movie disappoints me. Acting and all other information are good but the direction was not so good.

reviews.review_title: Tells about the Truth of our system
reviews.content: Firstly my apologies on behalf of the idiotic police and state government who framed Shri Nambi , who instead should have awarded and praised Shri Nambi , but instead a conspiracy was built of lies on framing him . It reminds of if east India company taking over India because of our own people's idocracy. Blame also the media and also the people who believed the media . And also the fellow scientist of the time - why they did not have the guts to stand with him when he needed them the most .why is media not getting people to the house of the police people and politicians involved and exposing them - because it seems they only want masala and destroy lives of innocent people . Irresponsible Journalism.I myself would have become a scientist in theoretical physics and I had the aptitude for it as had distinction in physics - but I choose not to become a scientist in 1994 when I saw how badly our Indian scientist are treated and what nonsense salaried they were being paid at the time by the stupid Congress government . This is a rot in the system . We throw bricks at our own brilliant people because we are so shallow and corrupt to the core . Why do you think brain drain is still happening . Also I still see Congress constantly still creating conspiracies to bring the nation down . Shame on Congress , the media , the state government of that state , the corrupt police . I hope those criminals who did this to Shri Nambi are hanged or at least they will answer for their misdeeds in hell .Shri Nambiji - if you are reading this . With folded hands I bow before you for your greatness and selfless service - it can't bring back the years - but know that the nation is with you . And thanks to the filmmaker's and actors who had the guts to make such a movie . Superb direction and acting .May God bless Shri Nambi and his family and friends who stood by him and also were affected .
Gem of a movie! Feather in Madhavan's cap! One of the very few movies we can remember for a long time! The best performances from all the actors! Very good screenplay and direction!

Speechless visuals and brilliant storyline with top notch acting and screenplay. Thank you Maddy for making this movie. I understand the amount of effort and money you have put in this movie and I hope it does well in coming days so that you can recover the budget used to create this masterpiece.

No words yaar, no words.No words. What a brilliantly shown.Great efforts and great biopic.Awesome................wonderful.........................................................................................Thanks for this movie.

reviews.review_title: The Hardships of Nambi Sir crafted in the most beautiful way
reviews.content:
First half was a bit boring due to the More use of scientific terms and a flat storyline. But the first half showed the rise of Nambi Narayanan Sir and it was good. The Second half was class!! Pure Class!! Some scenes literally made all of us cry. The last 1hr of the film was emotional.Acting - 10/10
Music- 10/10
Editing- 10/10
Screenplay- 9.5/10
VFx and Graphics- 10/10One of the best movies of 2022 and as well as the decade.

reviews.review_title: A Lot to Take Away From This Movie
reviews.content:
Only a limited amount of people can understand the value of this movie. Being a passionate engineer I can say that that this movie is authentic and accurate. From this movie:
It is important to know that how we worked from scratch and arrive here.It is important to know that how life is not always fair even when you work hard.It is important to know that how India isn't growing because of its own people greed.It is important to know that dispite of all barriers no one can stop you if you are consistent.It is important to know that even the life is not fair, you can make an impact eventually.I watched Mission Mangal movie and I was so sad that scientist in movie talking about pressure cooker and rubbish stuff...I mean what???Please don't do this type of joke again.This movie restore my faith, I feel full of emotion to watch what actually happened inside ISRO back then. I loved the testing part in France, and also feel proud and sad about a father lost his son during he was getting technology for India.Every engineer must watch this.

Absolutely simple storyline yet binding, the performance of r madhavan sir is the best, srk also shows his brilliant acting skills.About the storyline, it starts from the space and lands straight into your heart as it progresses towards the end, beautifully written detailed liye story of nambi sir, with extensive research that connects well to the life of Mr Nambi.Some of you might feel the first half a bit confusing and full of science but even the science is explained in simple enough way that you can understand what it is trying to say.I'm not a critic, and this is the first ever review I'm writing just because it deserves it. This movie is being underestimated and is being overpowered by opponent movies produced by popular names, the playtime is longer than current average but still keeps you gripped.I don't just want to give any spoilers, so I think this is enough to just say that every Indian should watch this film and that too with their families as it is a film worth watching with family.A personal note, some of the scenes are so emotional that it makes you want to cry and you can't cry..Thanks and go watch it else there'll be the regret like we have from missing watching Tumbad in theatres..

I dont want yo write here about movie that was marvelous splendid but why yhis happens in this country....even the man can go to nasa and live a luxurious life and wht does Indians do with him such shameful act and the compensation amount and padma bhusam will not bring the precious time back. Once a man said "all money cannit even buy a second". Hope this will never happend again.

reviews.review_title: WATCH IT IN YOUR NEARBY THEATRES
reviews.content: Maddy is back with a bang, making a movie on the falsely accused cryogenic scientist, Mr. Nambi Narayanan.The first half focuses on his scientific achievements while the second half leans more on the spy case, in which he was humiliated and tortured.The humour makes us giggle at some points. The movie is highly patriotic and emotional too.The cinema where I watched was half full. We were irritated when an idiot was laughing during an emotional scene. Another person had verbally abused him for laughing. THAT'S THE IMPACT OF THIS FILM!I watched the Tamil and can only review on Suriya's cameo. He plays his fictionalised version interviewing Nambi Narayanan. He was given a role and he did what he could do.Simran actually acting made me surprise due to her recent performances.This film deserves to be watched by everyone if not OSCARS.

Thousands of children will dream of becoming Mr. Nambi Narayan & will make India a real superpower.It's time for old folks in bollywood to learn from this before general public realize the damage you guys have done to last few generations of Indian youth by showing them unrealistic love stories & wasted humor.And one more thanks to Mr. Nambi sir for his lifelong contribution to this country. Overall, it's a pretty good movie based on the life of genius ISRO rocket scientist Nambi Narayan, who was dragged into a mess, due to leak of sensitive information, which he is not even part of it. The man behind the success of ISRO, who once rejected offer from NASA, was pulled into that mess without even realizing how much contribution has been done by him towards the country's space mission. After watching the movie it feels like his patriotism made him and his family go through such troublesome life. He could have taken up the offer from NASA and enjoyed his life to his fullest but he chose his country and this is what he got. This is how India is.

Eventually it has been proved that it was a fabricated conspiracy . But the real conspirators are not known till date ? Hopefully we find out someday but will that bring back Nambi Sir and his family the time that they lost due to this conspiracy?Madhavan has lived Nambi Sir on screen and it is difficult to imagine anyone else in this role and special mention to Simran who is also brilliant as his wife. The entire supporting cast does well.The underlying point here is that the nation needs to protect its brilliant minds else we will continue to lag behind other nations.

reviews.review_title: Great work on science and great story of real life patriotism
reviews.content: I have fallen in love with Madhavan 2.0 since Saala Khadoos. I always expected the nice trend to continue, and he did not disappoint me with this amazing movie, which in my opinion the first Indian movie that can be accounted as a very honest and detailed biography of a science man.The biggest highlight of the movie for me is about the detailing on the science through all the work and events that Padma Bhushan Nambi sir and his team are involved in. This is an area where the production is of the highest world class quality and I cannot remember even a second where there is a compromise on this area in the movie. The amount of detailing and research is a first, and clearly sits atop over several other works involving science or science fiction, and by a very big margin!The biggest aide to the above is the crisp and mean editing. I was hooked through out as the events in Nambi sir's life unfold and the editing really helps deliver the full impact of the amazing work and output Nambi sir and his teams delivered.The patriotism and sense of duty towards it are portrayed non-jingoistically and as natural traits of nationalists, which I totally expected from a work from Madhavan. Contrary to elitist, western physicality-oriented, and Indian pseudo-secular stereotypes around science and scientists. Well, anyone who has lived in South India and seen people easy with their simpleton dressing and lives does not have that stereotype anyway.The unbearable torture that Nambi sir faced and how he and his family coped with is shown without any political correctness or overzealous political affinity/opposition, too, which is another great point for me.Any patriotic son/daughter of land who thinks that Bose and others sacrificed their lives to give us this great freedom and future so that we can contribute back will definitely feel helpless, sitting in agony with tears rolling and closed fists, looking at the events unfold as they did for Nambi sir stopping him in his tracks. This is what the story telling of this part did to me.For me the only blemish, in the Hindi version that I watched, was the studio scenes. SRK hams. Hopefully, we'll get back the SRK of Kabhi Haan Kabhi Na, Chek De India, Fauji, and Circus.A can-not-miss-movie for all fellow Indians!

An eyeopener to how little we know about the achievements and hardships our scientists have gone through. The movie highlights the accomplishment of our very own Nambi Narayan. It is amazing to know that the impossible tasks that our indian scientists have done and it leaves us in disbelief. At times you can see that the movie is low in budget but the story and R Madhavan's acting covers for it. We need more of these movies with more money invested in it.A must watch!!!

The first half of the film is a bit jitter given the many transitions in Nambi's life, the second half, however, is stronger. With a run time of over 157 mins, the film never rushes and moves at a regular pace. 'Rocketry' does have bumps in its way but Madhavan manages to stir up a storm.Nambi Narayan had so much to achieve and so far to go, but he chose to give a thurst to India's space research. His decision a sacrifice or an honour, is something that the film tries to build throughout its runtime. It never gives its judgement to the audience, nor does it take sides, it simply wants the audience to know the story of Nambi Narayan. Yes, there are biases though!

reviews.review_title: Scientifically correct, dramatically emotional. Must watch
reviews.content: Obviously, most of the Indians might have hardly heard about Nambi Narayanan. The fact that he was a great scientific brain behind ISRO is not questionable however, since its a Nambi sir's narration so some scenes might have been exaggerated a bit, specially about every girl being glued towards his personality seems a bit over after a couple of times. Madhavan's acting has been beyond doubt a treat to watch, his real-life transformation pays dividend in his efforts to portray Nambi on reel. I was allured the way Simran played Mrs. Meena Narayanan, she put so many emotions in her comparatively smaller role that you can feel her pain.The movie is scientifically correct with every emphasis being put on keeping things theoretically reasonable unlike other Bollywood movies. However, it might be boring for some people in first half to process so much scientific information about rockets. The second half is emotional and forms the crux of the struggles that Nambi sir had to carry. Shahrukh Khan's role is not at all a guest appearance but stays from the beginning to the end although with a lesser screentime. SRK has been able to leave a mark in his small yet significant role. He offered a big sorry to Nambi sir at the end of the movie which really was long overdue considering Nambi sir's contribution during his career as a scientist and now as a rights activist.Since the movie presents a one-person perspective, therefore it might feel a bit heroic, exaggerated at times but has been able to spread knowledge in the youth about a great scientist of our nation and motivate them towards taking up space science as a career. I definitely would recommend this movie if you were moderately interested in space, science, and learning about greatness of our nation.

reviews.review_title: A fitting tribute to an unsung hero.
reviews.content: The movie was a fantastic tribute to a wronged and unsung hero Dr Nambi Narayan of the ISRO under whose team India developed its liquid propulsion engine which has been successfully used in all the missions. Yes this being Madhavan's first directorial venture may not be perfect, but it was still a fanstastic attempt.The first half portrays his journey from ISRO's early days to his studies in Princeton and struggles of his team to build the space program and his vision of seeing India becoming a major space player. The second half was brilliant showcasing the suffering his family had to go through for no fault of theirs. I was literally fighting to hold back my tears towards the end.Everybody did a fantastic job, especially Madhavan living Bambi's life and also Surya as himself.

reviews.review_title: I don't like biopics but oh boy!
reviews.content: I generally find it tough to sit through biopics, hence, i was sceptical at first to watch this movie in a theatre. But out my love of space research and ISRO, i decided to give it a try.And, my goodness, hats-off to Madhvan for picking this topic and his direction and his usual impressive acting. Movie maintains a good pace for story narration along with occasional laughter and pinch of melodrama.I just couldn't take my eyes off the screen for even 5 minutes. IN A BIOPIC!!Great job.

Rocketry deserves standing ovation.10:20 pm Show being Houseful speaks volume for itself.Heart wrenching story of Nambi Narayan which everyone need to know. Thanks to Madhavan for bringing his story to us in a such a beautiful way.Superb acting and great Direction by R Madhavan. Frankly, I wasn't having much expectations other than knowing the story of Nambi Narayan but the movie keeps you engaged right from first shot till the end.Everyone must watch this movie which teaches you things beyond the sufferings of a patriotic scientist.

Slow and Gripping at times, but in the end it hits the nail on the head.Shows in no uncertain terms the vulnerabilities of the 90s unipolar world and the havoc and destruction it can heap on a vulnerable developing nation.

reviews.review_title: I am sorry for reviewing any other movie as 10
reviews.content: I wholeheartedly support Mr. Nambi's cause. Such a great depiction of a great man.I loved the movie, and it should be seen by every Indian to understand the word patriotism and so no one can ever buy any of us.As the largest nation in the world, it is pathetic that the world still sees to stop us instead of supporting and uplifting us. It is essential for the advancement of human race altogether that India is supported in its causes as you will learn as you watch the movie.Best biopic if there was ever one.And thankyou R. Madhavan for bringing light on this world and the impact your work would have.

reviews.review_title: best movie ever or actually mirror to indian

around?A must watch for the youngsters to show the dedication of our Scientists back then which allows us a seat at the Table with the so called super powers of the world.

1. Movie took 6 years to make by a man utterly passionate about it. He lost weight, put on weight, grew hair, dyed hair white, even surgically displaced his own tooth to match real life character. WATCH IT.2. He kept things accurate to reality. But you will feel it's surreal 'coz how can one man do all this. The man Nambi Narayan is AMAZING. WATCH IT.3. There is big disparity between viewer rating and "critic" (jobless losers) rating. This is because the character in the movie is religious and according to "critics", it's the wrong religion (Hinduism). WATCH IT.4. Not the usual Bollywood BS with dance and action scenes. This is made in Hollywood style storytelling. WATCH IT.5. Tells the real life story of a one-in-100-million genius who refused a job offer at NASA given by the President of USA himself. "Critics" who abuse/ashame their motherland hate this level of patriotism. WATCH IT.6. Depicts also the story of a nation who's govt itself act to destroy the nation's scientific progress. A story of India prior to 2014. WATCH IT.

reviews.review_title: A Story of a True Hero
reviews.content: At 1st when the trailer was released i assumed it was atypical science movie featuring a scientist with his achievements..... But when I saw the whole movie I was left with tears and a guilt for not knowing a great person like him ...... Production and Direction was on point and didn't add any not essential stuff.... R. Madhavan was a usual fabulous with his screenplay and dialogues..... A must watch movie which is a 10/10 from me.

The story gives you chills and also makes you emotionally connect with Mr Nambi. It does not have any unnecessary songs, drama etc, just on point delivering its message. The scene whre Mr Nambi is beaten so hard yet he does not speaks a word made me cry :") However, if in some way we could have an idea of how this was all planned and executed, who all were behind it, it would be a happy ending which is desirous by many. But overall, great cinematography, excellent cast and brilliant acting by R Madhavan. I wish to see more such movies by Bollywood also would like to know why this happened. Enjoy this movie.

Most of the so called cinema critics are criticising the movie for its technical details, but that is what makes the movie different and amazing. And Madhwan sir has written it beautifully, it was an emotional experience though, going through the life of a strong mind which had to bear the gravest of injustice inspite of serving the country selflessly.

Hats off for our great indian scientist Dr. Nambi narayana sir.. we are proud sir.Also great thank you for R.madhawan he do very accurate and mindblowing acting as 100% like nambi sir.Must watch this movie.

reviews.review_title: At end, SRK's extended monologue was unnecessary
reviews.content: At the end, just 2 lines of sympathy from SRK could have been more than sufficient that could have added more authenticity to his character as a television host. The over dramatic monologue with bending his knees, shedding tears on television program was very absurd. On the top of it, even a single shot of the background crew getting emotional was sufficient but having multiple scenes of the crew shedding tears was very cringe. At last, Mr. Nambi caressing SRK's cheek was very unwanted scene. Without this scenes, the movie could have been more crisp and to the point. Other than this, very good movie.

reviews.review_title: Excellent Acting, Admirable Science and Unflinching Patriotism
reviews.content:
Excellent film with a wealth of information regarding ISRO's poor origins and its successes as it worked toward realising its vision
Madhavan played numerous characters in the film, including a spouse, friend, scientist, strategist, appealing personality to women, parent, victim of injustice, etc. His acting is so good that you will remember his remarks long after you have seen the movie.Even if the tale is a touch slow in spots, if you love science and are a patriot you will adore this movie. It picks up speed just when we need it and leaves us in awe.Guys, watch it now. ISRO is not a one-night success or a one-man show; rather, it is the result of the dedication, bravery, and sacrifice of numerous scientists and workers.

This movie is a must watch for every Indian!!The movie is all about ISRO, the hard work of our scientists, their dedication towards our country and sacrifices they make this movie is every one watch.

The writing too is pretty good. The scientific terms about rocket science, the concepts are not oversimplified for the audience which i liked being a science student myself. I like mission mangal too but taking out the scientific approach from a science film does not justify it. Other characters apart from nambi are not really written well. Even we don't get to know much about his family members and that is the exact reason why we can connect with nambi but not with his family members so much. The screenplay is pretty much engaging specially the second half where the drama portion is built well. The first half feels a bit stretched because of the reason of dubbing etc. But it does not harm the film.

This is an award winning performance by Madhavan, he surprised the audience with his looks and body language and how he transforms into Nambi Narayanan. The makeup department does an impressive job. Simran did wonders in the second half of the film. Shah Rukh Khan excels in a special appearance and his presence elevates the film. The supporting cast has done a decent job with limited written roles.

A well made movie takes us through the highs and lows of ISRO in a grand journey that makes us proud. I have followed the scandal since the beginning and once the initial buzz was over and CBI came in felt sad about a scientist being a pawn in between local and international politics. Brian Harvey's book provided further confirmation of the dirty international politics involved. The film begins as an interview with old nambi where he recollects his story and the Adrenalin rush that we get when we see Madhavan as Nambi achieve his goals is amazing. Superb performance from Madhavan, SImran, Surya and the team. Madhavan has made his mark. Full credit for taking up this topic. I am sure science students will find this fascinating as well.

reviews.review_title: The film gives the audience a glimpse into his rise to the top and how a false allegation impacted him and his family to the extent of great misery. The film sheds light on va
reviews.content: The film gives the audience a glimpse into his rise to the top and how a false allegation impacted him and his family to the extent of great misery. The film sheds light on various periods of his life, right from his days at Princeton University to his eventual arrest and then his hunger and fight for justice. However, what remained constant was the former ISRO scientist's love for the nation, and that's what strongly holds the film together.

reviews.review_title: Too glamorized and a little cringe, but otherwise OK

Also, most of the accounts of showing Nambi as everything from a maverick social engineer to an expert in all things rocketry are exaggerated, which the viewer is able to sense. Other than that, this is a nice movie. It has a nice performance by Madhavan and pretty much nobody else gets a chance to shine a lot except maybe the guy playing 'Unni', who does a decent job. The movie does feel like it's missing something. IMO it peaks within the first 10 minutes when Nambi's family is attacked. The rest is a slow decline but it tolerable.

Madhavan but this one was the best.I also saw the video of him speaking about doctor Nambi Narayana and the efforts he made to make the movie more crystal clear and life like.The best line of the movie for me was
"If you want to kill a dog...just anounce that it's mad.And if you want to destroy a man....spread that he's a traitor."

reviews.review_title: Pioneer of India's Present and Future
reviews.content: The story of Nambi Narayanan was one the whole country deserved to hear. In the age where patriotism is used as a veil to shield selfish agendas, this movie does a fantastic job of putting forward one truth that matters. We don't know about the whole truth, but the verdict of SC of India attests that the story portrayed has credibility to it.The anger and "retribution" they portray towards Nambi from the people doesn't just hit home for someone who is familiar with the volatility of heard mentality in India, but also points out one of the reasons behind the so called "brain drain" phenomenon often spoken about.The movie doesn't shy away from portraying Rocket Science for what it is. I didn't expect the movie to ever go into the details of combustion instability or the specific impulses of rocket motors, but as an aerospace engineer myself, I am proud to see that they didn't try to dumb it down assuming that the audience is incapable of understanding them. These scenes are shot incredibly well for anyone to understand the implications of these concepts if not the underlying theories.There have been a flurry of movies and shows that depict the achievements of ISRO and great Indian scientists, but I would put this movie at the top of the pecking order if you want a true sense of what these people had to go through to achieve their dreams and thus push India into the future.I would not want anyone to be biased by my perspective, but I say, give it a watch and build your own perspective!

reviews.review_title: How a hardcore patriot and India's potential space dominance was derailed

I just loved the quality of the dialogues written, they were music to my ears. Please watch the movie in the theaters while you can.

reviews.review_title: Don't complain about Indian filmmaking if you ignore masterpieces such as this
reviews.content: Rocketry is hands down one of the best movies to come out of India, and movies such as this need to be seen, understood and appreciated by the audiences.What makes it different from most other biopics is that this movie is almost unadulterated if adulterated at all. No extra masala, no unnecessary songs, no fictional elements. Just portrayal of actual happenings and facts in a way that can be understood.Nambi Narayanan is a really underrated hero and someone needed to bring his journey out to the masses. Great acting, direction and screenplay by Madhavan. Can't stop appreciating him for making the movie. All the rest of the cast has enacted very well too. And of course, SRK delivers another magical performance as himself.All the people who keep criticizing about Indian films and wouldn't stop praising the other movies, if you do not support movies like this, you have no right to complain. If we as audience wouldn't appreciate good movies of our country and wouldn't ensure their financial success, why would filmmakers make such movies at all? It's time we all appreciate the good cinema and encourage for more good films to be produced.

reviews.review_title: Strong story, balanced narration, never gets preachy

What's exceptional that Madhavan has superbly directed it, and hasn't let the movie go preachy anywhere; at the same time not diluting its scientific temper & appeal. His honesty towards the story is very evident from his treatment. A story that needed to be told.Hats off to Madhavan!! Shoutout to Nambi Narayanan's mettle.

1. Movie took 6 years to make by a man utterly passionate about it. He lost weight, put on weight, grew hair, dyed hair white, even surgically displaced his own tooth to match real life character. WATCH IT.
2. He kept things accurate to reality. But you will feel it's surreal 'coz how can one man do all this. The man Nambi Narayan is AMAZING. WATCH IT.
3. There is big disparity between viewer rating and "critic" (jobless losers) rating. This is because the character in the movie is religious and according to "critics", it's the wrong religion (Hinduism). WATCH IT. 
4. Not the usual Bollywood BS with dance and action scenes. This is made in Hollywood style storytelling. WATCH IT 
5. Tells the real life story of a one-in-100-million genius who refused a job offer at NASA given by the President of USA himself. "Critics" who abuse/ashame their motherland hate this level of patriotism. WATCH IT.
6. Depicts also the story of a nation who's govt itself act to destroy the nation's scientific progress. A story of India prior to 2014. WATCH IT.

rt_summary: Tracing the life of Narayanan, renowned for developing the Vikas Engine -- one of the most efficient, liquid fuel engines in the world today that continues to be a workhorse at the Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO) in almost every launch, with the unique distinction of never having failed -- the former ISRO scientist and aerospace engineer was inevitably embroiled in a spy scandal. The biographical drama will unveil the truth behind the mystery as it unravels in an interview by celebrated superstar of Bollywood, Shah Rukh Khan (in English and Hindi) and Suriya Sivakumar (in Tamil) on a TV program.
